channel.title: CVE Feed for MongoDB Inc -- MongoDB Rust Driver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MongoDB Inc -- MongoDB Rust Driver

item.title: CVE-2024-6382|2024-07-02T17:17:50.237Z -- mongodb%20inc -- mongodb%20rust%20driver
item.description: Incorrect handling of certain string inputs may result in MongoDB Rust driver constructing unintended server commands. This may cause unexpected application behavior including data modification. This issue affects MongoDB Rust Driver 2.0 versions prior to 2.8.2
